verses.verse: And Jesus <S%G1525>entered<s%> and <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2564>named<s%> <S%G2195>Zacchaeus,<s%> <S%G2532>which<s%> <S%G846><s%> was the <S%G754>chief<s%> among the <S%G754>publicans,<s%> and he was <S%G4145>rich.<s%>

And he <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> he was; and <S%G1410>could<s%> not for the <S%G3793>press,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he was <S%G3398>little<s%> of <S%G2244>stature.<s%>
And he <S%G4390>ran<s%> <S%G1715>before,<s%> and <S%G305>climbed<s%> up <S%G1909>into<s%> a <S%G4809>sycomore<s%> <S%G4809>tree<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> him: for he was to <S%G1330>pass<s%> that way.

And <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G5117>place,<s%> he <S%G308>looked<s%> up, and <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2195>Zacchaeus,<s%> <S%G4692>make<s%> <S%G4692>haste,<s%> and <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down;<s%> for to <S%G4594>day<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> your house. <S%G3624><s%>
And he <S%G4692>made<s%> <S%G4692>haste,<s%> and <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down,<s%> and <S%G5264>received<s%> him <S%G5463>joyfully.<s%>

And when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G1234>murmured,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> That he was <S%G1525>gone<s%> to be <S%G2647>guest<s%> with a <S%G435>man<s%> that is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>

And <S%G2195>Zacchaeus<s%> <S%G2476>stood,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> the <S%G2255>half<s%> of my <S%G5224>goods<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor;<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> I have taken <S%G5100>any<s%> thing from <S%G1536>any<s%> man by <S%G4811>false<s%> <S%G4811>accusation,<s%> I <S%G591>restore<s%> him <S%G5073>fourfold.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4594>This<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> is <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> as <S%G2530>much<s%> as he <S%G2532>also<s%> is a <S%G5207>son<s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>
For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2212>seek<s%> and to <S%G4982>save<s%> that which was lost. <S%G622><s%>

And as they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, he <S%G4369>added<s%> and <S%G2036>spoke<s%> a <S%G3850>parable,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> he was <S%G1451>near<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and because they <S%G1380>thought<s%> that the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G398>appear.<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> nobleman <S%G2104><s%> <S%G444><s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3117>far<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> for <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and to return. <S%G5290><s%>

And he <S%G2564>called<s%> his <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> and <S%G1325>delivered<s%> them <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>pounds,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4231>Occupy<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> I come. <S%G2064><s%>

But his <S%G4177>citizens<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> him, and <S%G649>sent<s%> a <S%G4242>message<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We <S%G2309>will<s%> not have this <S%G5126><s%> man to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> us.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> he was <S%G1880>returned,<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> he <S%G2036>commanded<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to be <S%G5455>called<s%> to him, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G694>money,<s%> that he might <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> much <S%G5101>every<s%> man had <S%G1281>gained<s%> by trading. <S%G1281><s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> the <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> your <S%G3414>pound<s%> has <S%G4333>gained<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2095>Well,<s%> you <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1401>servant:<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>little,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>
And the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> your <S%G3414>pound<s%> has <S%G4160>gained<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> to him, Be you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> here is your <S%G3414>pound,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2192>kept<s%> <S%G606>laid<s%> up in a napkin: <S%G4676><s%>

For I <S%G5399>feared<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you are an <S%G840>austere<s%> <S%G444>man:<s%> you <S%G142>take<s%> up that you <S%G5087>layed<s%> not down, and <S%G2325>reap<s%> that you did not sow. <S%G4687><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, Out of <S%G4675>your<s%> own <S%G4750>mouth<s%> will I <S%G2919>judge<s%> you, you <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G1401>servant.<s%> You <S%G1492>knew<s%> that I was an <S%G840>austere<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G142>taking<s%> up that I <S%G5087>laid<s%> not down, and <S%G2325>reaping<s%> that I did not sow: <S%G4687><s%>

<S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> not you my <S%G694>money<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G5132>bank,<s%> that at my <S%G2064>coming<s%> I might have <S%G4238>required<s%> <S%G846>my<s%> own with usury? <S%G5110><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them that <S%G3936>stood<s%> by, <S%G142>Take<s%> from him the <S%G3414>pound,<s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> it to him that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>
(And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%> )

For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That to <S%G3956>every<s%> one <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> shall be <S%G1325>given;<s%> and from him that <S%G2192>has<s%> not, <S%G2532>even<s%> that he <S%G2192>has<s%> shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> away from him.

But <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> not that I should <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them, <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> and slay <S%G2695><s%> them <S%G1715>before<s%> me.
And when he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> he <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1715>before,<s%> <S%G305>ascending<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, <S%G5613>when<s%> he was <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G967>Bethphage<s%> and <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the mount of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

<S%G2036>Saying,<s%> <S%G5217>Go<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G2713>over<s%> against <S%G2713><s%> you; in the <S%G3739>which<s%> at your <S%G1531>entering<s%> you shall <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied,<s%> where on <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> yet <S%G3762>never<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2523>sat:<s%> <S%G3089>loose<s%> him, and bring <S%G71><s%> him here.

And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2065>ask<s%> you, <S%G1302>Why<s%> do you loose <S%G3089><s%> him? <S%G3779>thus<s%> shall you <S%G2046>say<s%> to him, <S%G3754>Because<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of him.
And they that were <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> their way, and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as he had <S%G2036>said<s%> to them.
And as they were <S%G3089>loosing<s%> the <S%G4454>colt,<s%> the <S%G2962>owners<s%> thereof <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G3089>loose<s%> you the <S%G4454>colt?<s%>
And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of him.

And they <S%G71>brought<s%> him to <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> and they <S%G1977>cast<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> on the <S%G4454>colt,<s%> and they <S%G1913>set<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1913>thereon.<s%>
And as he <S%G4198>went,<s%> they <S%G5291>spread<s%> their <S%G2440>clothes<s%> in the <S%G3598>way.<s%>

And when he was <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near,<s%> <S%G2536>even<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2600>descent<s%> of the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> the <S%G537>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> and <S%G134>praise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works that they had <S%G1492>seen;<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G935>King<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> in the <S%G5310>highest.<s%>
And <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> from among the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> your <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you that, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> should <S%G4623>hold<s%> their <S%G4623>peace,<s%> the <S%G3037>stones<s%> would immediately <S%G2896>cry<s%> out.
And <S%G5613>when<s%> he was <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near,<s%> he <S%G1492>beheld<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> it,

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you had <S%G1097>known,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> you, <S%G1065>at<s%> <S%G2534>least<s%> in <S%G5026>this<s%> your <S%G2250>day,<s%> the things which belong to your <S%G1515>peace!<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> they are <S%G2928>hid<s%> from <S%G4675>your<s%> eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

For the <S%G2250>days<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> on you, that <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> shall <S%G4016>cast<s%> a <S%G5482>trench<s%> <S%G4016>about<s%> you, and <S%G4033>compass<s%> you <S%G4033>round,<s%> and <S%G4912>keep<s%> you in <S%G3840>on<s%> <S%G3840>every<s%> side, <S%G3840><s%>

And shall <S%G1474>lay<s%> you even with the <S%G1474>ground,<s%> and your <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> you; and they shall not <S%G863>leave<s%> in you one <S%G3037>stone<s%> on another; because <S%G473><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G1097>knew<s%> not the <S%G2540>time<s%> of your visitation. <S%G1984><s%>

And he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> out them that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G1722>therein,<s%> <S%G846><s%> and them that <S%G59>bought;<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying<s%> to them, It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> My <S%G3624>house<s%> is the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer:<s%> but you have <S%G4160>made<s%> it a <S%G4693>den<s%> of thieves. <S%G3027><s%>

And he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the <S%G2411>temple.<s%> But the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G4413>chief<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> him,
And could not <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> they might <S%G4160>do:<s%> for <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G1582>very<s%> <S%G1582>attentive<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> him.
